member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IIntegrationScript
member.summary: Provides the scripts for integration between Sitecore Cortex and a script host.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IIntegrationScript.ReturnValueStatement
member.summary: Gets the script to evaluate for getting the return value.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IIntegrationScript.NoOpStatement
member.summary: Gets a script that does nothing to test session state and keep sessions alive.
member.value: A statement that does nothing in the script's language.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IIntegrationScript.SessionInitializationScript
member.summary: Gets the script to initialize data access functions in a session.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IIntegrationScript.GetContextInitializationScript(Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the script to initialize the context for reading data from the specified key namespace.
member.param: The settings for the endpoints used to read and write data.
The key namespace.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSession
member.summary: Represents a session for running scripts in an external script host.
member.remarks: Instance members of are not thread safe, hence all method calls must be awaited. must be called when the session is no longer needed.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSession.Expired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this has expired.
member.remarks: An expired session can no longer be used.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSession.InitializeContextAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Initializes data access functions in the session for accessing data in the specified key namespace.
member.param: The key namespace.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSession.ExecuteScriptAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the specified script.
member.param: The script.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the result of the script if any.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSession.DisposeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Ends the session, and frees the resources used by this .
member.remarks: This method must not throw exceptions.
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSessionFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating s.
member.remarks: is implemented to support dependency injection. In async context should be used to avoid blocking.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSessionFactory.ScriptLanguage
member.summary: Gets the script language for this factory.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.IScriptSessionFactory.CreateSessionAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new .
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the created session.

members.member:
Disposes the pool asynchronously, and cancels all pending and running tasks.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
A task that represents the asynchronous operation.
Calling the method afterwards will do nothing, hence instances can be wrapped in using blocks.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings
member.summary: Provides settings for the Sitecore endpoints used by an to read and write data.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.#ctor(System.Uri,System.Uri,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The URL for the blob data endpoint.
The URL for the table data endpoint.

Optional path where the script host can find the certificate used for authenticating with the blob data endpoint. How this path is interpreted is specific to the script host. Certificate must be in PKCS #12 format (.pfx or .p12).
Optional password for the blob data certificate.

Optional path where the script host can find the certificate used for authenticating with the table data endpoint. How this path is interpreted is specific to the script host. Certificate must be in PKCS #12 format (.pfx or .p12).
Optional password for the table data certificate.
Optional path where the script host can find the public certificate of certification authority that issued the certificate for the blob service endpoint. Certificate must be in Base64 encoded format.

Optional path where the script host can find the public certificate of certification authority that issued the certificate for the table service endpoint. Certificate must be in Base64 encoded format.
If set to true invalid certificates from the blob and table service endpoints will be accepted.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.BlobServiceUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL for the blob data endpoint.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.TableServiceUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL for the table data endpoint.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.BlobServiceCertificatePath
member.summary: Gets the optional path where the script host can find the certificate used for authenticating with the blob data endpoint. Certificate must be in PKCS #12 format (.pfx or .p12).

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.BlobServiceCertificatePassword
member.summary: Gets the password for the blob data certificate, if any.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.TableServiceCertificatePath
member.summary: Gets the optional path where the script host can find the certificate used for authenticating with the table data endpoint. Certificate must be in PKCS #12 format (.pfx or .p12).

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.TableServiceCertificatePassword
member.summary: Gets the password for the table data certificate, if any.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.BlobServiceСaPath
member.summary: Gets the optional path where the script host can find the public certificate of certification authority that issued the certificate for the blob service endpoint. This certificate must be in Base64 encoded format.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.TableServiceСaPath
member.summary: Gets the optional path where the script host can find the public certificate of certification authority that issued the certificate for the table service endpoint. This certificate must be in Base64 encoded format.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.DisableTlsCertificateValidation
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether invalid certificates from the blob and table service endpoints will be accepted.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptContextSettings.ValidateUrlParameter(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Ensures the URL ends with a slash.
member.param: The URL.
Name of the URL parameter to validate.
member.exception: The URL must end with a slash

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Scripting.Abstractions.ScriptHostException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a script cannot be executed in a script host, for example due to a network error. This exception is unrelated to the script. If the script fails, is thrown.
